description: Bakery has a collection of decorations and foods mostly from traditional European bakeries. It also adds a few new cooking and food processing methods:
Brick Oven: Primarily used for baking various breads, pastries, and other delicious treats. The Oven also counts as a heat source for things like Cooking Pots and Kettles.

Caking Station: Processes cake dough into various confectionary treats. Place some Cake Dough on top of the Caking Station, then add your favorite topping via right-click. To make cupcakes, cut the placed Cake Dough with a bread knife. To make cookies, cut Cake Dough with a knife and then use a Rolling Pin to flatten them. Pick up your confectionary treat with a right-click!
Crafting Bowl: Used for making various doughs. Place the Crafting Bowl into the world and insert items by right-clicking them into the Bowl. Spin the ingredients until thoroughly mixed!

Small Cooking Pot: Place on a heat source, such as a Stove. Used for cooking a variety of foods - many of which need a container to be put in, such as a bowl or a jar, which is inserted into the bottommost slot in the GUI.
